mdBlocks.parent: ここでは活動で使用するツールである**Gitのインストール**と**Githubのアカウント登録**をする方法を説明します。
## Gitのインストール
### 1. インストーラーのダウンロード
Git公式サイト（[https://gitforwindows.org/?_fsi=LfoGMNmY](https://gitforwindows.org/?_fsi=LfoGMNmY)）にアクセスしてください。 Downloadボタンをクリックしてください。

![%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.19.19.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/ef24dd58-7dc7-45b9-b5bd-e50f9cd2fa59/%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.19.19.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB4666M6RVH6I%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T113850Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIESnhS%2BQouD0qLy%2F1LLAckLAKptRHT1SoAaN%2B0gaEiEzAiBdDvYKva0kVHOnzGCwtV2UBYcbvttRVwAT7kRxvhp6ICr%2FAwgUEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIMxkUN2dIvccvojliwKtwDuDwVWBf0l7uNkmV6ZnlHQpnw5dt1KnYh7S2OWnAVjClBp%2BZTSB89lXXP8roj4Fmm8XByp%2BY%2BkOefnxTaZaWqkixqjc0y4cSXT7n39Dfd8EjcCmb7bt8oAmirAhLe%2FPc8Qi9jJQBegQXfCtZi8qnjP2p8xQQd36%2Bn8O7TnwF07aRLDC0o2C1SlKSrzLMicV5q7S3gseGfgv30iqgFWkYACAyxq4g%2Fjc9oLKIHRzT4h%2FNHFWMxdigaTyNd2ep8tiuBZLy4xhGH1WSFW6dvyPLYfK3NCzkJaxI4Fta2kVypARAtkOJEvCIO6T4oL47OXaBylylfB%2BHWBA9HggYR8HB1UoEKzCYgu0d79yBZYi%2Fcpz99egvg9D9nBV4fnVf2OEBeREu8LU82T5nbmCs%2BdIA%2BpIkXsxewkAWDTAZgx8uoOWNkcOLW3XwxEX%2FHotcX%2FcfZW%2BFgQNeOFHF3EZmKL%2BdLIkwl26H0WEjWFwCeOjHtiXr9MnF%2B38trRzPxP9cGZFqASHydZ4kJEqQ6qYgprSUojMlA%2By1jCRUzH%2Ffe9K4bBp%2FeeylrH4B87zoi6%2Bie5xUTQlKri12LhfV4%2Bfy0r1spFAimymvq8hWjnCP0ct46j%2Fz3f%2FJoNvKoAfQ48twww7DVvgY6pgFZFDewDfnJv%2BlM1fPdl%2B8jfsv1tUtpHqMOIZEVYJr8Kf4Y18Ne6%2BbMTvNfRypnZzfithqSSlKvWks1fVSqVMKmCqJrP5x9WV8msZX7dj%2FWIEEZgoRJc12FUM6h4kfckR%2FxdyYbp2vuDX1YRxGJJ40zrOHr3hrccP7alf3JJO7%2BdsLk0ROQh%2BNqayYck19mRsP5DtHpv9Ias3XonYUox9oTF3G%2Fc3A4&X-Amz-Signature=380000cc8a7de52698d0413554969a8cb6b58955d561577034123917bbe94830&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
Gitのインストーラーがダウンロードされます。（※数分かかります）

![%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.24.48.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/79573433-f039-4aca-9f94-d45271b62a25/%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.24.48.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB4666M6RVH6I%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T113850Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIESnhS%2BQouD0qLy%2F1LLAckLAKptRHT1SoAaN%2B0gaEiEzAiBdDvYKva0kVHOnzGCwtV2UBYcbvttRVwAT7kRxvhp6ICr%2FAwgUEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIMxkUN2dIvccvojliwKtwDuDwVWBf0l7uNkmV6ZnlHQpnw5dt1KnYh7S2OWnAVjClBp%2BZTSB89lXXP8roj4Fmm8XByp%2BY%2BkOefnxTaZaWqkixqjc0y4cSXT7n39Dfd8EjcCmb7bt8oAmirAhLe%2FPc8Qi9jJQBegQXfCtZi8qnjP2p8xQQd36%2Bn8O7TnwF07aRLDC0o2C1SlKSrzLMicV5q7S3gseGfgv30iqgFWkYACAyxq4g%2Fjc9oLKIHRzT4h%2FNHFWMxdigaTyNd2ep8tiuBZLy4xhGH1WSFW6dvyPLYfK3NCzkJaxI4Fta2kVypARAtkOJEvCIO6T4oL47OXaBylylfB%2BHWBA9HggYR8HB1UoEKzCYgu0d79yBZYi%2Fcpz99egvg9D9nBV4fnVf2OEBeREu8LU82T5nbmCs%2BdIA%2BpIkXsxewkAWDTAZgx8uoOWNkcOLW3XwxEX%2FHotcX%2FcfZW%2BFgQNeOFHF3EZmKL%2BdLIkwl26H0WEjWFwCeOjHtiXr9MnF%2B38trRzPxP9cGZFqASHydZ4kJEqQ6qYgprSUojMlA%2By1jCRUzH%2Ffe9K4bBp%2FeeylrH4B87zoi6%2Bie5xUTQlKri12LhfV4%2Bfy0r1spFAimymvq8hWjnCP0ct46j%2Fz3f%2FJoNvKoAfQ48twww7DVvgY6pgFZFDewDfnJv%2BlM1fPdl%2B8jfsv1tUtpHqMOIZEVYJr8Kf4Y18Ne6%2BbMTvNfRypnZzfithqSSlKvWks1fVSqVMKmCqJrP5x9WV8msZX7dj%2FWIEEZgoRJc12FUM6h4kfckR%2FxdyYbp2vuDX1YRxGJJ40zrOHr3hrccP7alf3JJO7%2BdsLk0ROQh%2BNqayYck19mRsP5DtHpv9Ias3XonYUox9oTF3G%2Fc3A4&X-Amz-Signature=03c8526080a64cb83a35776246246c84bd6cb19d742e13826dfa6dcdfe59a26d&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
### ２. インストール
ダウンロードしたインストーラーをダブルクリックして起動しましょう。

![%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.26.37.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/adee1e38-a96e-487d-9d4c-9279202d7dc0/%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.26.37.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB4666M6RVH6I%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T113850Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIESnhS%2BQouD0qLy%2F1LLAckLAKptRHT1SoAaN%2B0gaEiEzAiBdDvYKva0kVHOnzGCwtV2UBYcbvttRVwAT7kRxvhp6ICr%2FAwgUEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIMxkUN2dIvccvojliwKtwDuDwVWBf0l7uNkmV6ZnlHQpnw5dt1KnYh7S2OWnAVjClBp%2BZTSB89lXXP8roj4Fmm8XByp%2BY%2BkOefnxTaZaWqkixqjc0y4cSXT7n39Dfd8EjcCmb7bt8oAmirAhLe%2FPc8Qi9jJQBegQXfCtZi8qnjP2p8xQQd36%2Bn8O7TnwF07aRLDC0o2C1SlKSrzLMicV5q7S3gseGfgv30iqgFWkYACAyxq4g%2Fjc9oLKIHRzT4h%2FNHFWMxdigaTyNd2ep8tiuBZLy4xhGH1WSFW6dvyPLYfK3NCzkJaxI4Fta2kVypARAtkOJEvCIO6T4oL47OXaBylylfB%2BHWBA9HggYR8HB1UoEKzCYgu0d79yBZYi%2Fcpz99egvg9D9nBV4fnVf2OEBeREu8LU82T5nbmCs%2BdIA%2BpIkXsxewkAWDTAZgx8uoOWNkcOLW3XwxEX%2FHotcX%2FcfZW%2BFgQNeOFHF3EZmKL%2BdLIkwl26H0WEjWFwCeOjHtiXr9MnF%2B38trRzPxP9cGZFqASHydZ4kJEqQ6qYgprSUojMlA%2By1jCRUzH%2Ffe9K4bBp%2FeeylrH4B87zoi6%2Bie5xUTQlKri12LhfV4%2Bfy0r1spFAimymvq8hWjnCP0ct46j%2Fz3f%2FJoNvKoAfQ48twww7DVvgY6pgFZFDewDfnJv%2BlM1fPdl%2B8jfsv1tUtpHqMOIZEVYJr8Kf4Y18Ne6%2BbMTvNfRypnZzfithqSSlKvWks1fVSqVMKmCqJrP5x9WV8msZX7dj%2FWIEEZgoRJc12FUM6h4kfckR%2FxdyYbp2vuDX1YRxGJJ40zrOHr3hrccP7alf3JJO7%2BdsLk0ROQh%2BNqayYck19mRsP5DtHpv9Ias3XonYUox9oTF3G%2Fc3A4&X-Amz-Signature=4a9923cce9036f76e109a6b7159592945cb904ccd5acff852a7c1d7b96a8e3f2&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
あとは「Next」ボタンを押し続けてインストーラーをすすめ、最後の画面で「Install」ボタンをクリックして下さい。（設定値を変更する必要はありません。）
## GitHubアカウント登録
GitHub公式サイト（[https://github.com/](https://github.com/)）にアクセスしてください。
「Sign up for GitHub」をクリックしてください。

![%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.31.39.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/23992aab-7e58-481d-b855-79492cbb9db8/%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.31.39.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB4666M6RVH6I%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T113850Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIESnhS%2BQouD0qLy%2F1LLAckLAKptRHT1SoAaN%2B0gaEiEzAiBdDvYKva0kVHOnzGCwtV2UBYcbvttRVwAT7kRxvhp6ICr%2FAwgUEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIMxkUN2dIvccvojliwKtwDuDwVWBf0l7uNkmV6ZnlHQpnw5dt1KnYh7S2OWnAVjClBp%2BZTSB89lXXP8roj4Fmm8XByp%2BY%2BkOefnxTaZaWqkixqjc0y4cSXT7n39Dfd8EjcCmb7bt8oAmirAhLe%2FPc8Qi9jJQBegQXfCtZi8qnjP2p8xQQd36%2Bn8O7TnwF07aRLDC0o2C1SlKSrzLMicV5q7S3gseGfgv30iqgFWkYACAyxq4g%2Fjc9oLKIHRzT4h%2FNHFWMxdigaTyNd2ep8tiuBZLy4xhGH1WSFW6dvyPLYfK3NCzkJaxI4Fta2kVypARAtkOJEvCIO6T4oL47OXaBylylfB%2BHWBA9HggYR8HB1UoEKzCYgu0d79yBZYi%2Fcpz99egvg9D9nBV4fnVf2OEBeREu8LU82T5nbmCs%2BdIA%2BpIkXsxewkAWDTAZgx8uoOWNkcOLW3XwxEX%2FHotcX%2FcfZW%2BFgQNeOFHF3EZmKL%2BdLIkwl26H0WEjWFwCeOjHtiXr9MnF%2B38trRzPxP9cGZFqASHydZ4kJEqQ6qYgprSUojMlA%2By1jCRUzH%2Ffe9K4bBp%2FeeylrH4B87zoi6%2Bie5xUTQlKri12LhfV4%2Bfy0r1spFAimymvq8hWjnCP0ct46j%2Fz3f%2FJoNvKoAfQ48twww7DVvgY6pgFZFDewDfnJv%2BlM1fPdl%2B8jfsv1tUtpHqMOIZEVYJr8Kf4Y18Ne6%2BbMTvNfRypnZzfithqSSlKvWks1fVSqVMKmCqJrP5x9WV8msZX7dj%2FWIEEZgoRJc12FUM6h4kfckR%2FxdyYbp2vuDX1YRxGJJ40zrOHr3hrccP7alf3JJO7%2BdsLk0ROQh%2BNqayYck19mRsP5DtHpv9Ias3XonYUox9oTF3G%2Fc3A4&X-Amz-Signature=31724317945c310fdeb6cc1abb2c1466b7b9d55dc359aeb55650cc651926485b&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)

Sign up画面でメールアドレスとパスワードとユーザーネームを登録してください。
Email preferences項目のチェックボックスはチェックする必要はないです（不定期に製品の更新情報やお知らせを受け取るかどうかという項目）。
画面遷移したら「検証する」をクリックしてください。ロボットによる登録でないことを証明するため、画面の指示に従って進めてください。

![%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.36.37.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/1173f44b-f803-4554-8c41-235a3d38cf48/%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.36.37.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB4666M6RVH6I%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T113850Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIESnhS%2BQouD0qLy%2F1LLAckLAKptRHT1SoAaN%2B0gaEiEzAiBdDvYKva0kVHOnzGCwtV2UBYcbvttRVwAT7kRxvhp6ICr%2FAwgUEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIMxkUN2dIvccvojliwKtwDuDwVWBf0l7uNkmV6ZnlHQpnw5dt1KnYh7S2OWnAVjClBp%2BZTSB89lXXP8roj4Fmm8XByp%2BY%2BkOefnxTaZaWqkixqjc0y4cSXT7n39Dfd8EjcCmb7bt8oAmirAhLe%2FPc8Qi9jJQBegQXfCtZi8qnjP2p8xQQd36%2Bn8O7TnwF07aRLDC0o2C1SlKSrzLMicV5q7S3gseGfgv30iqgFWkYACAyxq4g%2Fjc9oLKIHRzT4h%2FNHFWMxdigaTyNd2ep8tiuBZLy4xhGH1WSFW6dvyPLYfK3NCzkJaxI4Fta2kVypARAtkOJEvCIO6T4oL47OXaBylylfB%2BHWBA9HggYR8HB1UoEKzCYgu0d79yBZYi%2Fcpz99egvg9D9nBV4fnVf2OEBeREu8LU82T5nbmCs%2BdIA%2BpIkXsxewkAWDTAZgx8uoOWNkcOLW3XwxEX%2FHotcX%2FcfZW%2BFgQNeOFHF3EZmKL%2BdLIkwl26H0WEjWFwCeOjHtiXr9MnF%2B38trRzPxP9cGZFqASHydZ4kJEqQ6qYgprSUojMlA%2By1jCRUzH%2Ffe9K4bBp%2FeeylrH4B87zoi6%2Bie5xUTQlKri12LhfV4%2Bfy0r1spFAimymvq8hWjnCP0ct46j%2Fz3f%2FJoNvKoAfQ48twww7DVvgY6pgFZFDewDfnJv%2BlM1fPdl%2B8jfsv1tUtpHqMOIZEVYJr8Kf4Y18Ne6%2BbMTvNfRypnZzfithqSSlKvWks1fVSqVMKmCqJrP5x9WV8msZX7dj%2FWIEEZgoRJc12FUM6h4kfckR%2FxdyYbp2vuDX1YRxGJJ40zrOHr3hrccP7alf3JJO7%2BdsLk0ROQh%2BNqayYck19mRsP5DtHpv9Ias3XonYUox9oTF3G%2Fc3A4&X-Amz-Signature=bb4d502167b93c48ab0b2593b28b7a2a016d0ba23679ac57e7a41d7e890c85d5&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
画面が遷移したら、登録したメールアドレス宛のメールに記載されたコードを入力してください。
